"About the new Rideroid Function":
"This will explain the functions of the Rideroid.
① Auto Shot
As long as you're within range of the enemy,
you will automatically shoot.
② Spin Attack
By pressing <%PhotonArts>, you can perform a melee
attack with high attack power.
③ Homing Missiles
From your subpalette, you can use this skill
to launch a barrage of missiles.
④ Over Boost.
From your subpalette, you can use this skill to
enable the use of the boosters to give yourself a speed boost."

"In this quest
the number of times the Rideroid was destroyed
affects your quest clear rank.

Take special care to avoid the obstacles
that the enemy uses to attack.
If you're too far from the enemy,
you will begin to take damage.
Utilizing the many HP Rings
will restore your HP and PP,
in-case you need them."
